events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate. Their resume shows relevant experience developed over the past five years.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to keywords like software developer and experience with cloud infrastructure.
A recruiter experienced in engineering candidates has been assigned to oversee the process and coordinate the following steps.
Initial phone screening was conducted to evaluate the candidateâ€™s technical skills and cultural fit, with an encouraging outcome.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm about the position and confirming availability for the next interview.
The technical interview with the lead engineer has been scheduled for Friday at 3 PM to further assess development skills and system design.
Technical interview went well. Candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities and deep knowledge of relevant software engineering practices.
HR interview has been scheduled for the following week to discuss benefits, company culture, and final candidate queries.
